projects.title: Employd
projects.description: An iOS app to assist with unemployment benefits. Received a Congressional Certificate after Texas Workforce Commissions sponsored the app.

projects.title: Wing AI
projects.description: A generative AI shopping assistant used in 7 Shopify stores to enhance customer experience.

projects.title: Wing AI Healthcare
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered medical scribe to assist in healthcare documentation.

projects.title: Wing AI Healthcare 2
projects.description: Built an AI-powered healthcare frontdesk system and a healthcare translation tool for medical documentation.

projects.title: Audibraille
projects.description: Created an attachable device for glasses to convert books into audio in real-time, supporting 100+ languages for blind students in India.

projects.title: ORAGutan
projects.description: Developed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) benchmark to evaluate generative AI systems.

projects.title: WebGauntlet
projects.description: A web safety and security benchmark designed for testing web agents against malicious internet content.

projects.title: AgentOS
projects.description: Built a multi-agent workflow creator that automates processes using natural language input.

projects.title: Chameleon
projects.description: An application that automatically customizes resumes and cover letters for job applications.

projects.title: Stock Picker
projects.description: An AI tool that uses deep learning to identify optimal stock investments.

projects.title: 4G Coverage Optimization
projects.description: Developed algorithms to optimize 4G coverage for telecom networks.

projects.title: Black Scholes Investment Engine
projects.description: Implemented an investment engine using the Black-Scholes model for option pricing.
